Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

| Property Name |
| --- |
| shapes of EQE curves of devices |
| stronger absorption of PC 70 BM |

Note: EQE stands for External Quantum Efficiency, which is a material property that describes the efficiency of a device in converting external light into electrical current. Therefore, the "shapes of EQE curves of devices" can be considered a material property as it relates to the behavior of the material under specific conditions.
